name: Automatiser les r√©sum√©s de r√©union avec Google Drive, Gemini AI et Google Docs
description:
# G√©n√©rateur de r√©sum√© de r√©union AI avec int√©gration Google Docs

## Pour qui est-ce
- √âquipes qui enregistrent des r√©unions et souhaitent des r√©sum√©s rapides et clairs sans prise de notes manuelle.
- Managers qui ont besoin que les √©l√©ments d'action soient extraits automatiquement.
- Quiconque utilisant Google Drive + Google Docs comme espace de travail central.

## Comment √ßa fonctionne / Ce que √ßa fait
Ce flux de travail automatise la documentation des r√©unions :

1. Surveille un dossier Google Drive pour de nouveaux fichiers audio/vid√©o de r√©union.
2. T√©l√©charge le fichier et transcrit la parole en texte en utilisant Gemini AI.
3. R√©sume les transcriptions en Discussions Cl√©s et √âl√©ments d'Action.
4. Cr√©e ou met √† jour un document Google avec le r√©sum√© format√© (titre, puces, cases √† cocher, style).
5. Envoie la sortie finale √† Docs avec des titres en gras, des puces et un espacement pour la lisibilit√©.

## Comment configurer
- Ajoutez votre d√©clencheur Google Drive pour surveiller un dossier.
- Connectez Gemini AI pour g√©rer la transcription + le r√©sum√©.
- Configurez l'outil Google Docs pour cr√©er/mettre √† jour vos documents de r√©sum√©.
- (Optionnel) Utilisez le Code Node + l'API Docs pour appliquer le formatage des puces/cases √† cocher.

## Exigences
- Google Drive OAuth2 ‚Äì pour surveiller et t√©l√©charger des fichiers
- Google Docs OAuth2 ‚Äì pour cr√©er et mettre √† jour des documents
- Google Gemini API ‚Äì pour la transcription + le r√©sum√© aliment√© par l'IA

## Comment personnaliser le flux de travail
- Changez le dossier Google Drive √† surveiller pour un autre espace de travail.
- Modifiez l'invite syst√®me dans le R√©sumeur pour ajuster le style de r√©sum√© (par exemple, plus de d√©tails, d√©cisions uniquement, etc.).
- Modifiez les r√®gles de formatage du Code Node (puces, cases √† cocher, texte en gras).
- Ajoutez des int√©grations (par exemple, Slack, Email, Notion) pour envoyer des r√©sum√©s au-del√† de Google Docs.

parameters.title: ={{ $('Execute when new file created of meeting of audio/video').item.json.name.replace(/\.mp4$/, '') }}

parameters.jsonSchemaExample:
{
  "summary_text": "Meeting Summary - August 31, 2025

- Book club for "Inspired" scheduled for August 7th.
- New hires must read "Inspired" as part of onboarding.
- Customer interviews: Follow up with contacts from CS and Sales.
- Q3 engagement survey to be completed by all members.",

options.systemMessage:
=You are an assistant that processes meeting transcripts.  

Your job is to:  
1. Read the meeting transcript provided.  
2. Extract the main discussion points.  
   - Keep them short, clear, and action-oriented.  
   - Focus only on decisions, tasks, or important updates.   

Google Docs Rules:  
- If the Google Doc for this project/meeting does not exist ‚Üí **create a Summary Docs** with the formatted summary.  

Give summary and docs id Give both Seprately.

Formatting rules:
- Start with a title in this format: üìå Meeting Summary ‚Äì {{new Date().toLocaleDateString()}}
- Use bold section headers like **‚ú¶ Key Discussions** and **‚úì Action Items**.
- Use ‚ú¶ bullets for general discussion points.
- Use ‚úì checkmarks for tasks or follow-ups.
- Keep sentences short, clear, and actionable.
- Add blank lines between sections for readability.
- Avoid long paragraphs ‚Äî use concise bullets only.

nodes.name: Execute when new file created of meeting of audio/video

parameters.content:
# üé§ AI Meeting Summary Generator with Google Docs Integration
## üìã Overview
- Automated system that takes meeting audio/video files from Google Drive, transcribes them, generates concise summaries with AI, and formats everything neatly into Google Docs.

## üîÑ How It Works
#### Real-Time Processing
1. üé• Record Meeting Audio/Video ‚Üí Capture your meeting and place the file into your chosen Google Drive folder.
1. üìÇ Google Drive Trigger ‚Üí Watches that folder (e.g., ‚ÄúSpeech of Meetings‚Äù) for new uploads.
2. ‚¨áÔ∏è Download File ‚Üí Fetches the newly uploaded file from Google Drive.
3. üéô Transcribe File (Gemini Audio Model) ‚Üí Converts meeting speech into raw text transcript.
4. ‚úçÔ∏è Summarizer (Gemini Agent) ‚Üí Reads transcript ‚Üí extracts:
          - ‚ú¶ Key Discussions
          - ‚úì Action Items
          - Adds title with date, structured bullets, and checkmarks.

#### Document Creation & Structuring
5. üìÑ Create Summary Docs (Google Docs Tool) ‚Üí Creates a new Google Doc if none exists for the meeting.
6. üìä Structured Output Parser ‚Üí Ensures AI output is structured (summary_text + doc_id).
7. üé® Format Summary (Code Node) ‚Üí Applies formatting rules:
- Bold/italic text
- Bullet points (‚ú¶)
- Checkmarks (‚úì)
- Clean line spacing for readability

#### Final Output
8. üöÄ Send to Google Docs (BatchUpdate API) ‚Üí Pushes formatted summary into the newly created Google Doc.

## ‚öôÔ∏è Configuration Required
#### Credentials Needed:
- üîë Google Drive OAuth2 ‚Üí For file monitoring & downloads
- üîë Google Docs OAuth2 ‚Üí For creating & updating docs
- üîë Google Gemini (PaLM) API ‚Üí For transcription + summarization

#### Settings:
- Trigger: Every new file created in the specified Drive folder
- AI Model: gemini-2.5-flash for transcription & summarization
- Output: Google Docs with structured & styled meeting notes

## üéØ Key Features
‚úÖ Auto-transcription of meeting audio/video
‚úÖ Smart AI-generated summaries (Key Discussions + Action Items)
‚úÖ Google Docs integration with professional formatting
‚úÖ Structured JSON parsing for reliable updates
‚úÖ End-to-end automation (no manual intervention needed)

## üìù Notes
- Works for both audio & video meeting files
- Creates a new doc per meeting automatically
- Uses batchUpdate API for fine formatting (bullets, bold, italics)
- Keeps summaries short, clear, and action-oriented

user.name: Parth Pansuriya
user.bio: I build smart and scalable automation workflows using n8n to simplify tasks, connect apps, and boost productivity. From WhatsApp bots to AI-powered systems, I create seamless automations tailored for business and creators.
